messages.subject: Re:LOTR
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/29/2002 11:45:08 AM Central Daylight Time, ... One of them was stockier than the other.  That s how I told them apart....but most of the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/29/2002 11:45:08 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


>
> I was way familiar with the story, and still the first time I saw it I
> would
> have to think. I finally started going by costume to tell Aragorn at a
> glance from Boromir.

One of them was stockier than the other. That's how I told them apart....but
most of the time I was just looking at Legolas. <g>

I had the "S" name problems when I read the books lo these many years ago,
too...almost to the point of making me totally confused, in places.

Becky In Iowa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
